content.rendered:
Directed by Thirumala Kishore

Written by Magizh Thirumeni. Thirumala Kishore. Thirumala Kishore

Cast Ram Pothineni(Siddharth / Aditya). Nivetha Pethuraj(SI Yamini). Malvika Sharma(Mahima). Amritha Aiyer(Gayathri). Sampath Raj(CI Nagendra Kumar). Satya(Vema). Sonia Agarwal(Bharati). Nassar(Judge). Krishna Murali Posani(Partha Sarathy). Vennela Kishore(Purushotham). Pavitra Lokesh(Pavithra (as Pavithra Lokesh)). Narra Srinivas(Sudhakar). Sasidhar(Bhupathi (as Shashidhar Paramahamsa)). R.C.M. Raju(Constable Paidi). Pammi Sai(Constable Raghava). Sivannarayana(Tamil Lawyer). Ravi Prakash(Siddharth and Aditya’s Father). Charandeep Surneni(Babji). Koteswara Rao(Seth). Mahesh Achanta(Purushotham’s Assistant). Racha Ravi(Hospital Attender). Praveen(Akash). Surya Srinivas(Siddharth’s Friend). Pratyusha Sadhu(Mahima’s friend). Maya Nelluri(Ruby). Lavanya Reddy(Gayathri’s sister). Ram Charan Teja(Child Siddharth / Child Aditya (as Charan Ram)). Master Sathwik(Teen Siddharth / Teen Aditya). Chakravarthii(Seth’s son). Ramachandra(ATM Repairman)

Language Telugu

Producers Krishna Chaitanya. Ivano Fucci. Ravi Kishore. Venkat Krishnamaneni.

Production Sri Sravanthi Movies. Goldmines Telefilms
